author: Andrea Fox
text:
Hello,
ICMA has noticed a renewed interest in job descriptions for Sustainability Managers/ Directors/ Coordinators from our members. If your jurisdiction has this type of job description that you would be willing to share, could you please post it on the Knowledge Network or email it to me at afox@icma.org? 
You can upload documents to the network here: http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/documentform 
Thanks in advance,
Andrea Fox
Deputy Director, Center for Sustainable Communities
International City/County Management Association (ICMA)
202 962 3641 
202 962 3500 fax
afox@icma.org
title: Sustainability Manager Job Descriptions
